about_the_game:
What makes Wisp Catacombs a unique rogue-like game?


  • The enemy diversity. (Seeing a dancing cactus, a shotgun urchin, and a crystal golem is rare sight!)
  • Fast movement. (Invincible dashes, quick turns, and a standstill healing system require skill.)
  • The choices the player(s) can make. (Will the players trust or confront their creator?)
  • The player(s) can start as one class and finish with completely different abilities.
  • Local 4-player mode. (You can play up to 4 players without any compromises - the game will adapt its difficulty scaling (loot prices, enemy damage/health, rewards, etc.) depending on the player count.)
  • Brutal difficulty. (Don’t take this part lightly.)

What are the main gameplay Features?


  • Players can use their dash to dodge projectiles. It’s fast and effective.
  • No ammo: when you attack, you lose energy! The energy is also your health!
  • Swappable abilities: 2 attack types (simple and area), an ultimate attack, and a passive stat.
  • Items which upgrade your base stats. A battery can gives you more energy (health), a vacuum can upgrade your regeneration, etc.
  • 6 power types, 100+ total powers! Experiment with each attack!

The player(s) can explore 6 worlds that each have their enemies, bosses and unique twists.

Explore the different features of the worlds...

With 6 worlds, you will have to adapt to different combat styles and strategies. You will survive against fire snakes, big scarabs, bats, creepy spiders and ... Urchins?

Each enemy has their own little twist.

Some enemies will interact with each other to create new attacks. You’ve got to create a strategy unique to specific enemy groupings. And each enemy will have its own story that you will need to find!

Play up to 4 players against the monsters!

Wisp Catacombs can be played up to 4 players. Level configurations are randomly generated, having multiple different room types such as shops, chests, puzzles and enemies. Explore diverse worlds and face hardcore challenges with the scalable difficulty system. Oh, don't worry, it won’t be too difficult! The wisps will be able to choose their difficulty… But at what cost?

You will see a lot of bullets...

You will have to confront bosses that vomit copious amounts of projectiles! You can manage, though: with 150+ powers distributed in multiple types of elements, strategic maneuvers will lead you to victory! Players can switch between playstyles, and approach challenges in different ways. This keeps the gameplay exciting.

Secrets and wonders.

Despite having randomly-generated worlds, there are secret paths and shortcuts that experienced players can use not only to their advantage, but also to discover fascinating endings. And the secrets don’t stop at the first playthrough – beating the game with each class in a specific way will uncover the elusive “true path.” Will you be the first to discover it?

short_description: Wisp Catacombs is a creative top-down roguelike - play as Wisps, solo or with friends, and use their powers to explore worlds, defeat bosses, and uncover the mystery of your creator to fix everything in this chaotic universe...
